references: Lakhtakia, Akhlesh, and Russell Messier. "Self-similar sequences and chaos from Gauss sums." Computers & graphics 13.1 (1989): 59-62. See Eq. (4b).
maple: Digits := 20: tau := evalf( (1+sqrt(5))/2): A005821 := proc(n) option remember; if n <= 1 then n; else A005821(n-2)+floor(tau*A005821(n-1)); fi; end;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
